title: Serve Task Configuration
description: Defines parameters for the webserver which is spun up by the Serve Task

$schema.description: Part of the JSON Schema standard, this optional keyword declares the URL of the schema that the file conforms to. Editors may download the schema and use it to perform syntax highlighting.

api.title: API server configuration
api.description: Parameters which configure the API server, which runs simultaneously and allows for mock testing

port.title: API Port
port.description: The port which the API server listens on

entryPath.title: API Entry Point Path
entryPath.description: The path to the script to run as the API server

initialPage.title: Initial Page
initialPage.description: The path to the page which should open automatically after this task completes

port.title: Port
port.description: The port on which to host the file server.

hostname.title: Hostname
hostname.description: The name of the host on which serve is running. Defaults to 'localhost'

https.title: HTTPS Mode
https.description: If true, the server should run on HTTPS

pfxPath.title: HTTPS PFX Path
pfxPath.description: Path to the HTTPS PFX cert

tryCreateDevCertificate.title: Should Create Dev Certificate
tryCreateDevCertificate.description: If true, when gulp-core-build-serve is initialized and a dev certificate doesn't already exist and hasn't been specified, attempt to generate one and trust it automatically.

location.description: CustomAction type, or location of commands

defaultSnippets.description: The context menu of the item(s)
The top command set menu in a list or library
Both the context menu and the command bar

properties.description: An optional JSON object containing properties that are available via the 'this.properties' member.

^[0-9a-f]{8}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-.description: Simulates a custom action. When you deploy and register this component in a site, you'll create this CustomAction object and describe all the different properties you can set on it.

pageUrl.description: URL of the modern page that should be used to test the extension

customActions.description: The list of extensions that should be loaded

serveConfigurations.description: Configuration objects used as the '--config' parameter for local testing
